trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_SEQ_00<tab>Eaduuard appears to be toying with a defective device of some sort.

TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_SEQ_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to either Marques or Eluned at the Church of Saint Adama Landama, depending on your progress.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.

TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_SEQ_02<tab>Marques identifies the oven as an alchemist's alembic, and states that while he can modify it for Eaduuard's purposes, he requires a bronze ornamental hammer, which can be purchased from the merchants at Camp Drybone.

TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_SEQ_03<tab>According to Marques, the makeshift oven should take no longer than a day to prepare─a truly amazing feat of engineering. Just how the refugee acquired such advanced skills is a mystery to all, including the man himself...

TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_TODO_00<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and accept it again to restart.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_TODO_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and accept it again to restart.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_EADUUARD_000_000<tab>Aw, just my luck! I scavenged this here oven, thinkin' I could use it to make myself hot meals, but it looks to be in a bad way. Lots of dents, a few holes even...
TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_EADUUARD_000_001<tab>Hey, you're pretty well traveled, ain't ye? Ever seen one of these before─or better yet, know how to fix it? No? Bah...
TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_EADUUARD_000_002<tab>Wait, I know who we ought to ask. Mind showin' this oven to Marques for me? He repaired a clockwork toy I found once, so maybe he can do somethin' with it.
TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_MARQUEZ_000_010<tab>...Is there something I can do for you?
TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_MARQUEZ_000_011<tab>This...this is an alchemist's alembic. You say the boy wishes to use it for cooking?

TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_MARQUEZ_000_012<tab>I suppose it would be possible, were I to make some modifications...but I would need a bronze ornamental hammer to do so. Can you bring me one, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? You need only go so far as Camp Drybone to find a merchant who sells tools.
TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_MARQUEZ_000_020<tab>I can convert the alembic into a makeshift oven, but only once you have brought me that hammer.
TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_MARQUEZ_000_021<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It shan't take more than a day, I believe.
TEXT_GAIUSB502_00871_MARQUEZ_000_022<tab>It's strange...I know I must have learned these skills long ago, but I haven't the foggiest when and where that was...
